sub_title: Researcher, and Consultant | Climate Change, Migration, Gender and Sociology |
summary: Engaging and inspiring trainer with experience spanning over academia, non government organisations, and research work. Several years of experience as an education consultant with expertise and interest in gender and sexuality discourses, migration and climate change. Recognised as  a creative and interactive lecturer on gender, sexuality, and research  methodology.
